item.title: Bitget Launches ETH Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) Activity, Enjoy DCA Cashback and 10% APR Subsidy
item.description: On July 23rd, in celebration of the 10th anniversary of ETH, Bitget launched an ETH dollar-cost averaging (DCA) event. During this event, new users who create a DCA plan for the first time and invest at least 100 USDT in ETH will receive a 10% cashback on the DCA amount. The maximum cashback is 100 USDT, and the total prize pool is 10,000 USDT.In addition, if new or existing users DCA into ETH and hold it until August 6th at 0:00 (UTC+8), they can enjoy a 10% APR ETH financial management coupon based on the DCA amount. The coupon duration is 2 days, and the maximum coupon amount is 20 ETH. The rewards are awarded on a first-come, first-served basis while supplies last. The event runs from July 22nd at 15:00 to August 5th at 15:00 (UTC+8).

item.title: 20 billion PUMP tokens reportedly moved from Binance hot wallet back to the project team's associated address
item.description: On July 23rd, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), it is reported that 2 billion PUMP tokens have been transferred from Binance's hot wallet back to an address related to the project. A week ago, these tokens were deposited into Binance and then transferred to the address 9SnqX...seSGz. Half an hour ago, they were sent back in batches from that address.

item.title: PENGU Surpasses BONK in Market Cap to Become the Largest Meme Coin in the Solana Ecosystem
item.description: On July 23rd, according to CoinGecko data, PENGU surged by more than 19.5% within the past 24 hours and reached a market capitalization of 27.85 billion US dollars, surpassing BONK (27.01 billion US dollars) to become the Meme coin with the largest market capitalization in the Solana ecosystem.

item.title: Binance will delist the GPS/FDUSD and HIVE/FDUSD spot trading pairs
item.description: On July 23, as per official information, Binance will remove the GPS/FDUSD and HIVE/FDUSD spot trading pairs and halt trading at 11:00 (GMT+8) on July 25, 2025.

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Watch: Multiple Whale Addresses Saw Large Withdrawals in the Past 24 Hours
item.description: On July 23rd, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), several whales carried out large withdrawals within the past 24 hours. Specifically:The whale whose address begins with 0x97E5b withdrew a total of 15,605,560 USDC during the last 24 hours;The whale with an address starting with 0xa3121 withdrew approximately 9,000,000 USDC in the past 24 hours;The whale whose address begins with 0xD9a1Ed withdrew approximately 10,000,000 USDC in the last 24 hours;The whale with an address starting with 0xb4Caaf withdrew approximately 1,300,000 USDC in the past 24 hours.

item.title: Five new addresses have accumulated a total of 76,987 ETH today, equivalent to around $285 million.
item.description: On July 23rd, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, an additional three new addresses withdrew 10,703 ETH (amounting to $39.6 million) from Kraken today.Up to now, there have been a total of five new addresses that have accumulated 76,987 ETH (valued at $285 million) today.

item.title: Samson Mow: The real bull run has not yet begun, BTC could rise to $500,000 to $1 million in the next 12 months
item.description: On July 23rd, as per Cointelegraph, Samson Mow, the CEO of the Bitcoin technology company Jan3, declared that the actual bull market has not yet begun. He holds the belief that Bitcoin could ascend to a range between $500,000 and $1 million within the next 12 months.

item.title: ETH Staking Queue Reaches Nearly 620,000 ETH
item.description: July 23rd. Based on on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the queued ETH for staking has grown to approximately 620,000 ETH, accompanied by a net redemption of 271,000 ETH. On-chain data indicates that within the past week, two wallets within the HTX ecosystem have redeemed a combined total of 110,000 ETH, with a value exceeding $400 million. Institutions such as Abraxas Capital Management have also carried out staking redemptions.

item.title: A certain whale bought 475 WBTC and opened a long position for 434.6 BTC.
item.description: On July 23rd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, Whale 0x3E38 purchased 475 WBTC at an average price of $115,733 (amounting to $56 million) and utilized it to take a long position in BTC by borrowing on Aave.Furthermore, they also established a long position on Hyperliquid for 434.6 BTC (valued at $51.6 million) with a leverage of 10x. The total profit exceeded $5 million.

item.title: In the last 24 hours, the total NFT transaction volume across the network reached $20.4 million, a 20.9% decrease.
item.description: On July 23rd, based on CoinGecko data, the total 24-hour global NFT trading volume amounted to $20.404 million, experiencing a 20.9% decline.Moreover, the total market capitalization of the global NFT market has reached $6.335 billion, with a 24-hour decrease of 2%.
